scripts.k6:run:basic: npm run k6:build && k6 run dist-k6/main.test.js
scripts.k6:run:basic:docker: npm run k6:build && docker run --rm -i --env-file .env -v %cd%:/work -w /work grafana/k6:0.50.0 run dist-k6/main.test.js
scripts.k6:run:with-trading: npm run k6:build && k6 run dist-k6/main.test.js -e RUN_BUY_SELL=true
scripts.k6:run:with-trading:docker: npm run k6:build && docker run --rm -i -v %cd%:/work -w /work -e BASE_URL -e CHAIN_ID -e RUN_BUY_SELL=true grafana/k6:0.50.0 run dist-k6/main.test.js
scripts.k6:analyze: npm run k6:build && k6 run dist-k6/analyze-api.js
scripts.k6:launchpad: npm run k6:build && k6 run dist-k6/launchpad-test.js
